mapper.select: SELECT no, service_no serviceNo, service_startdate serviceStartdate, service_day serviceDay, service_date serviceDate, regdate FROM schedules WHERE service_no = #{no} ORDER BY service_day, service_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedules (no, service_no, service_startdate, service_day, service_date, regdate) SELECT schedules_seq.nextval, #{serviceNo}, #{serviceStartdate}, #{serviceDay}, #{serviceDate}, systimestamp FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT no FROM schedules WHERE service_no = #{serviceNo} AND (service_day = #{serviceDay} OR service_date = #{serviceDate}) )

INSERT INTO schedules (no, service_no, service_startdate, service_day, service_date, regdate) VALUES (schedules_seq.nextval, #{serviceNo}, #{serviceStartdate}, #{serviceDay}, #{serviceDate}, systimestamp)
